Elementary instrumental students in 5th and 6th grade please leave your instrument at home at this time. Information about lessons and rehearsals will be received in the next couple of weeks.

Safety measures and protocols are in place and we are looking forward to making music with all of you. Please do not hesitate to contact one of the music teachers if you have any questions.

August 19 at 10 AM via ZOOM

If you attend in person, masks will be necessary and there will be a wellness questionnaire to complete before entering the auditorium. Thank-you for your cooperation!

Check LATEST NEWS on the B-G Website, www.bgcsd.org, for the ZOOM invite information. If you have any questions, please call 607-967-6321.

post_text: For the entire week leading up to the 100th day of school, kindergarteners worked on how they can be helpful to others. In doing so, students earned quarters for doing chores/helpful deeds at home. Classes set a goal of 100 quarters/helpful deeds by the 100th day of school with the intention that the money earned would be donated to the local SPCA. Students counted their quarters today and grouped them by 10's. We are happy to say that the kindergarteners at Guilford Elementary raised $143.25 for the Chenango SPCA with their hard work and kind gestures throughout the week. That's a total of 580 helpful deeds completed this week! Great job kindergarteners! Miss. O'Rourke, Mrs. Pain & Mrs. Wombacker are very proud of their students!
